title: "Dashboard!!"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}

nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, price)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~neighbourhood, y = ~price, color = ~neighbourhood, type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}

nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Price: ", price, "\nNeighborhood: ", neighbourhood)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~lat, y = ~long, color = ~price, text = ~text_label, 
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers", alpha = 0.5
  )

```

### Chart C

```{r}

nyc_airbnb %>% 
  count(neighbourhood) %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~neighbourhood, y = ~n, 
          type = "bar")

# Cannot knit: rmarkdown::render("dashboard.Rmd", output_format = "flexdashboard::flex_dashboard")

```
